title: All students summoned to schools from March 14
body_lines: A circular has been issued instructing schools to summon all students from Monday (14), the Education Ministry Secretary of Education, Prof. Kapila Perera said.
Prof. Perera said the relevant circular has been sent to all schools and pirivenas.

The Ministry has also directed the schools to take pertinent measures in consultation with the zonal education directors at times of an emergency situation in relation to COVID-19. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
